name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Recipe Viewer & Grocery Assistant | Ceres Cart

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy an ad-free recipe browsing experience and instantly add ingredients to your cart!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say goodbye to cluttered recipe websites and endless scrolling through the author's life story. With Ceres Cart's ad-free reader view, you can focus solely on the recipe. Plus, real-time prices from local Kroger and Walmart stores make grocery shopping effortless. Add ingredients to your cart with a single click and streamline your meal planning like never before!

ðŸ”‘ Key Features: 

âœ… Recipe Detection: Instantly identifies recipes and pops up automatically. 
âœ… Ad-Free Reader View: Read recipes in a clean, clutter-free format without annoying ads or distractions.
âœ… One-Click Ingredient Shopping: Easily add all the recipe ingredients to your online grocery cart at Kroger or Walmart with just one click. 
âœ… Bypass Paywalls: Automatically bypasses paywalls on popular websites like NYT, Epicurious, America's Test Kitchen and more! 

Ceres Cart makes cooking, meal planning, and grocery shopping more convenient than ever. Install now and enjoy a faster, simpler way to get everything you need for your next recipe!

Note: All Walmart links generated via Ceres Cart Chrome extension include an affiliate tag.
